Utilities

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Borders

Utility classes to manipulate your borders
<span class="border red bg-light" style="display: inline-block; height: 50px; width: 50px; margin: 0.2em"> </span>

Styles

Classes to style your tags
Corners
.rounded Add a .rounded with to round the corners
.circular Add a .circular with to make a circle
Styles
.dotted Add a .dotted to use a dotted border
.dashed Add a .dashed to use a dashed border
.thick Add a .thick to use a thick border
.thin Add a .thin to use a thin border
